text: 10|90|hananim-eun iseula-el jasondeul-ibadaleul geonneoge hasa palaowa geu ui gundaega geudeul-eul dwijjoch-euna hongsu lo geudeul-eul igsake hani geuga malhagil jeoneun iseula-el jason-i midneun sin oeeneun daleun sin-eul midji anhgess-eumyeo jeoneun ttohan sunjonghaneun ja gaundeissgessnaida hadeola
